reviewText: My son has become obsessed with bible stories. I bought this DVD to keep in my car for him to watch while we ate traveling. It is one of his favorites and usually gets brought into the house so he can finish it!

I love this DVD and so do my grandchildren. I had the one from the Old Testament and have been looking for this new testament version for a long time. I'm so glad I found it!  It arrived quickly and undamaged.
I was disappointed. Very boring and biased to one denomination.
A gift for my grandchildren. I have not heard any complaints
Keeps children engrossed in the stories of the bible.
It's what you would expect for a young child.
The stories are excellent for children and my grandchildren like them.
